news.title: Oklou Releases New Remix EP Featuring Nick León, Malibu, and More: Listen
news.summary: Aaron Hibell and Jamesjamesjames also contribute to Choke Enough (Remixes)

news.title: Watch Justin Vernon Play a Divorce Attorney and Limo Driver in Bon Iver’s New “From” Video
news.summary: The musician whisks newlyweds around with donuts and beer in his new SABLE, fABLE visual

news.title: Mal Devisa to Return With New Palimpsesa Compilation
news.summary: The 29-track collection includes remastered early work and previously unreleased material from the poet, singer, and songwriter Deja Carr

news.title: Animal Collective Share New Song “Love on the Big Screen”: Listen
news.summary: Avey Tare and Adam McDaniel produced the band’s first single of 2025

news.title: Joni Mitchell Announces New Jazz Compilation, Shares “Be Cool” Demo: Listen
news.summary: The career-spanning, 61-track Joni’s Jazz features Mitchell’s collaborations with Wayne Shorter, Jaco Pastorius, Herbie Hancock, and Charles Mingus

news.title: Boris Announce Tour for Pink’s 20th Anniversary
news.summary: Cloakroom, Uniform, Agriculture, and more will open for the Japanese noise-rock trio

news.title: Bob Dylan Announces Art Book Point Blank (Quick Studies)
news.summary: The Simon & Schuster collection features approximately 100 drawings alongside “prose vignettes” by Eddie Gorodetsky, Jackie Hamilton, and Lucy Sante
